query: Can you generate a one-week travel itinerary for a group of 3 from Newark to Florida covering 3 cities from March 18th to March 24th, 2022? Our budget is $10,400. We require accommodations that are entire rooms. Although we won't be self-driving, we'd prefer locations that allow parties.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Fort Myers,Orlando,Miami]
